sportsProducts.name: Adidas Originals Trefoil T-Shirt
sportsProducts.description: The Adidas Originals Trefoil T-Shirt is a classic and stylish tee that's perfect for everyday wear. It's made from soft, comfortable cotton and features the iconic Trefoil logo.

sportsProducts.name: Nike Elite Crew Socks
sportsProducts.description: The Nike Elite Crew Socks are a high-performance sock that's perfect for athletes. They're made from moisture-wicking materials that keep your feet dry and comfortable, and they feature a compression fit that helps to improve your performance.

sportsProducts.name: Shock Doctor Sports Knee Pads
sportsProducts.description: The Shock Doctor Sports Knee Pads are a comfortable and protective pair of knee pads that are perfect for athletes of all levels. They feature a dual-density foam construction that provides excellent impact protection, and they're designed to be breathable and comfortable to wear.

sportsProducts.name: Puma Suede Classic Shoes
sportsProducts.description: The Puma Suede Classic Shoes are a classic and stylish pair of shoes that's perfect for everyday wear. They're made from durable suede and feature a comfortable rubber sole.
